programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Amma to get lunch ready. Bing watches yummy peas and delicious carrots go into the pot, but when lunch is served theyre all mixed up together and Bing doesnt like it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing falls in love with a lost dog he and Flop find in the park and decides he wants to keep her. When the owner turns up Bing is very upset when it comes to saying goodbye to his new friend.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Spring has arrived and Tilda fervently wants to paint a white sheep on a green meadow. She grabs her easel and sets off. Her friends may have lots of other suggestions for things she could paint, but she has her heart set on a sheep. Her friend Patrick the sheep turns out to be a difficult model: he just cant keep still.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: When Molly visits Tilda, her friend is looking for a birthday present for Rupert. In the end, Tilda decides on a blue scarf. Molly suggests sending Rupert the present as a parcel to make the surprise all the bigger. A great idea, thinks Tilda.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Ruperts sensitive hedgehog nose tells him that the weather tomorrow is going to be fantastic. He at once informs Tilda and the two friends decide to prepare a picnic. The other friends join in and the preparations last long into the night, with Molly and Rupert finally falling asleep in Tildas living room. .

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Summer’s day Little Field Mouse is very excited to show Little Nutbrown Hare her new favourite thing, a very pretty flower… the prettiest ever! She lets Little Nutbrown Hare borrow it to show Big Nutbrown Hare, but when it blows away during the night Little Nutbrown Hare worries how his friend will react. Will he be able to work up the courage to tell her what happened?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Trying to keep cool on a sticky Summer’s day by the stream, Little Nutbrown Hare and Big Nutbrown Hare have lots of fun skipping stones and throwing sticks. When Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that sticks float, the two follow the sticks down the river to see where they go. It’s not an easy chase, and there is a surprise around every corner. Where will the sticks end up?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Summer is at its hottest and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse want to run and play but the sun is just too hot and strong. That’s until Little Grey Squirrel gives them both a wonderful present, big leafy parasols. When he later changes his mind and takes Little Nutbrown Hare’s parasol back, the little hare is naturally disappointed. Can the friends find a way for all of them to be happy?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, the trainees have to play a game. They have to find ‘pairs’ of chuggers behind different-coloured roundhouse doors. Koko and Brewster do well, but easily-distracted Wilson fails the first time around. After a pep talk from Vee, he applies himself – and by concentrating really hard, he wins his badge!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Over at the garden, the Junior Rangers are working together on PlatypusOne with new upgrades . Katie uses her tablet to run a diagnostic while Leo checks on the vehicle’s engine. Leos watch suddenly beeps, revealing a call from Kyle, who then sends them a selfie he took with which he describes as the coolest-looking fish hes ever seen. Leo And Katie learned those fishes are actually sharks. They try calling Kyle again but he doesnt answer so they immediately travel to his location. Once theyre there, they can’t find Kyle so Katie uses her tablet to track his GPS location. The Junior Rangers dives underwater as PlatypusOne transforms into a submarine and they search for Kyle. Soon enough, they come across Kyle near 3 hammerheads and he waves Leo and Katie. Kyle explains with a flashback and then Hero goes out of the vehicle to swim with the sharks. Leo tells them the waters are too deep for young sharks to swim at and they need to guide them to shallower water above. Suddenly Ranger Rocky appeared as he was nearby. The Junior Rangers explain their issue so Ranger Rocky calls on Ranger Joey for help. Ranger Joey gives out helpful advice, which gives Katie an idea to use the electrical current of PlatypusOne to guide the hammerhead sharks.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In a bamboo forest, Kai is controlling his drone, Kaimera1000, to test the drones moves but gets startled when he sees a beetle on the hologram screen. Kai drops the drone, and they discover a giant panda paw print next to it. Felt curious, he plans to call the Junior Rangers. Back in the garden, Leo is relaxing while Katie draws. He asks Katie to pass him an apple but Katie ignores him and tell him to do it himself. Kai then contacts Leo through his wrist gadget, showing him the giant paw print he found. Leo and Katie go to the treehouse and use the computer to confirm that the paw print belongs to a giant panda. They learn about giant pandas characteristics, such as their black and white fur and their status as a national treasure in China. They discover that giant pandas used to be critically endangered but are now less threatened due to conservation efforts. Leo contacts Kai again, and they decide to find and study the giant panda. Leo, Katie, and Hero, their dog, get ready and embark on their mission and meet at Kais location. The Junior Rangers meet up with Kai and they try to find the panda, thanks to Kais drone. They then meet up a Giant Panda who is eating some bamboos. Kai try to capture pictures but then Hero suddenly barks at it. The children then see a Panda cub starts following Hero. It tries to playfully wrestle with Hero. Hero isnt amused as the panda cub keeps bothering him. Hero then gets annoyed and runs away, causing the panda cub to choose over Hero then its mother. The mother panda realizes its cub is missing and starts bleating a sound.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When T’choupi misses out on going to the market with Fred, Nina decides to cheer him up by suggesting they "sell their wares at the market," like a couple of adults -right there, in the hamlet where they live! The friends find some great produce, which they then promptly sell to their parents. The latter are delighted with their wares; only problem is, Dad would have loved to be able to bake a yummy pie but has no eggs with which to make it…

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While out on a picnic with T’choupi and his family, plus Nina, Dad chances upon a four-leaf clover! He gifts it to Fanni as a lucky charm. programme.title: Charley Loves Nature

programme.desc: Sam has a toothache. His daddy goes to get Dr. Bobola, but Dan, his older brother, thinks the doctor is going to pull his tooth! To avoid this, Julia tries to takes care of Sam instead of the doctor.

programme.desc: Mommy must go shopping but when she’s back, she wants the Triplets to play for her and her friend the new piece they learn "The Flower’s Dance". programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplet’s armchair is quite damaged, Mommy decided to recover it with a new fabric and it will be to the siblings to choose the color! programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Diesel is not a very helpful engine, but at Christmas, when there is so much extra work to be done, his unhelpfulness is really unwelcome and unkind, especially when he refuses to stop for Paxton who has been derailed. Thomas decides to help Diesel see the error of his ways. Over the course of the next few days Diesel is visited by what appear to be ‘ghostly engines’ who remind him just how unhelpful he has been in the past, the joy helping others can bring at Christmas and the danger that if you don’t help others they might not come to help you when you really need them. When Diesel becomes derailed himself and fears that he could be abandoned the message finally hits home.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Brewster is given the task of transporting the huge tunnel boring machine. A team of chuggers helps him, but one by one they all get called away or drop out. Meanwhile Old Puffer Pete rounds up a bunch of small and not particularly strong chuggers. Brewster is disheartened when they can’t even budge the machine an inch. He thinks hard and musters up all his energy to motivate them with an inspirational chant. It works and before too long they deliver the tunnel borer safely to the site.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Wilson has to guard the safari park while the Chuggineers work at night to replace some track. His patrol is fairly uneventful until Pete rolls up behaving very strangely and talking gibberish. It turns out that Pete is sleep-­‐riding and must be taken back to the depot. Not long after, Pete appears again and Wilson rushes all around Chuggington trying to catch him. Pete happily wanders through the rhino enclosure and then pays the Chuggineers a visit. Wilson thinks hard and devises a plan - he clamps Pete onto one of the CP transporter wagons.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: During Bing’s bedtime routine he inadvertently pees on his blankie and it’s too wet to wash and dry before bed. Fortunately his Hoppity Voosh toy has a cape just as soft and huggy as blankie and it even smells just right too.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Flop jump. When Bing tries out his new tricks on Charlie he finds out the power of Boo has to be scaled down for babies.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Amma’s crèche, a talking ride on car. It seems like fun until Talkie Taxi keeps saying the same thing over and over again. When the taxi crashes and is finally silenced Bing and Sula use their imagination to play a game they really want to play without being dictated to by the noisy taxi.

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters
programme.desc: Get to know our little pets better through charming stories featuring the characters from the popular Bing series.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Daddy is very busy today: he is baking a super cake for Mommy’s birthday. Everything has to be ready so they can surprise her when she gets home from the office. Simon and Gaspard have promised daddy that they will straighten up their rooms and set the table for the big event. But the two brothers also want to prepare their own surprise for mommy.. In order to get everything done in time, Simon and Gaspard realize they are going to have to straighten up their room and set the table…in their own particular fashion! Whoa, is Mommy ever going to be surprised!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: It’s Mother’s Day when all the mothers get together to talk about their daily lives and the community. Meanwhile, the fathers and children prepare them a pleasant evening along with some surprises. Rosie has decided to mark the occasion with a lovely sculpture for her mother but things do not turn out quite as expected.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a hunt for treasure in the meadow and collect all kinds of unique gems like flowers, feathers, apples and egg-shells. But there’s a hole in Little Nutbrown Hare’s leaf-bag and he loses the precious collection along the way. Luckily, Big Nutbrown Hare is not far behind to collect the lost treasure as well as follow its trail to find his son.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse innocently pick lots of Spring flowers from a field and deliver bunches to their friends. When they realise that they are being followed everywhere by a cloud of yellow butterflies, they realise that the butterflies need the flowers, to feed from their nectar. How will they lead the little butterflies to more flowers and sweet nectar?

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Boribon makes a little den for himself under a big table. He furnishes it and fills it with his favourite things. Then he wants to invite guests, but soon realises that no one else can fit into this little house...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam, Julia, and the other kids in the Mouse Mansion read the adventures of Magic Mouse, a magazine hero. But one day, some of them are helped by Magic Mouse who seems to really exist...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia always play together. Tonio and Ella challenge them to spend an afternoon without each other. But will they be able to do it, and even try to see each other without being seen?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets have a new idea on their mind, they want to be exactly the same and in that purpose, they wear masks at breakfast to trick Mommy. Their attempt is completely useless because, as Mommy says, "theyre a lot different from each other". The Triplets dont agree and they want her to start dressing them identically. Mommy refuses, she doesnt want robots as children. But when they meet other Triplets in the park that day, they finally realize its not so bad to be different.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: At the end of a day without arguing, the Triplets dont want to go to bed because they want to stay together, even at night ! Poet has an idea, they should meet in dreamland and then share the same dream together. Turbulent and Girl think its a wonderful idea and follow Poet in his game. But the problem is, when they arrive at Dreamland, none of them wish to do the same dream. Poet wants a dream with polar bears and lots of hugs, Turbulent wants to live on a deserted island and Girl wishes to take care of little babies...

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Wilson has to guard the safari park while the Chuggineers work at night to replace some track. His patrol is fairly uneventful until Pete rolls up behaving very strangely and talking gibberish. It turns out that Pete is sleep-­‐riding and must be taken back to the depot. Not long after, Pete appears again and Wilson rushes all around Chuggington trying to catch him. Pete happily wanders through the rhino enclosure and then pays the Chuggineers a visit. Wilson thinks hard and devises a plan - he clamps Pete onto one of the CP transporter wagons.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Four teams compete to win Malcolms Wildlife Photo Challenge

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Chaos ensues at Pontypandys first ever Country Market when Sarah and James try to outsell Mandy and Norman, causing apples to fly everywhere.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Jake has lost something in the park – it’s a surprise so he can’t tell Kipper and Tiger what it is. They find a treasure map signed by Bluebeard the pirate and follow the clues. When they all meet up again Kipper and Tiger realise Jake lost the map. The treasure hunt was to be a surprise for Kipper’s birthday, but Jake’s even go the date wrong!

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper finds Tiger messily trying to make a clay pot on his new potter’s wheel. They decide to make some pots together and Tiger tells Kipper how difficult it is. Pig gives Arnold a ride on the potter’s wheels thinking it is a car without wheels. They find the pots Tiger and Kipper have been making and think they’re chocolate cookies. Tiger has some explaining to do.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou’s balloon fun at the harvest fair is cut short when his excitement causes him to accidentally lose his balloon. A make-believe hot air balloon race teaches him a lesson in mindfulness, which he puts to use to win a new red balloon!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is disappointed that he has to stop flying paper airplanes for bath time, so Daddy suggests an underwater adventure where Caillou realizes that when one adventure doesn’t work out, it’s okay to let it go because there are other ways to have fun.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Rebecca tells James he could be a comic-book super-engine, he takes her seriously, and Rail Rocket is born.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari and Farah are camping together at an open area in the rainforest, sitting beside a campfire. Farah is using a flashlight and is telling a spooky story. As Farah is narrating to Zari, they hear sounds coming from the tall grass at the edge of the campsite. Farah investigates it with her flashlight but Zari stops her because shes scared. Farah insists that its just a story and they need to help if its an animal in trouble. Zari reluctantly agrees and tell Farah to go first. It turns out to be a small Malayan Tiger Club. Back in the garden, Leo attaches a night-vision motion-activated camera to a tree while Katie stands nearby with her tablet. Leo asks Katie why theyre doing this and Katie replied its to see all the animals that come out at night. Hero tested it out and bark at the camera, causing it to take a picture and send the picture to Katies tablet. Leos watch suddenly rings, revealing Zari and Farah calling them to help with the Malayan Tiger cub they found. Katie examines the picture Zari sent to her and learns more on the animal on her computer. Zari realize that the cub is separated from her mother and ask the Rangers for help, which the Rangers agree with. They ride PlatypusOne and meet up with Zari and Farah. The Junior Rangers arrive and Hero meets with the Malayan Tiger cub and the two gets along. Katie reminds Leo they need to be careful with wild animals and the duo activate their jetpack to scout ahead. The Junior Ranger begins their search with Leo and Katie on the sky while Farah, Zari and Hero search the ground.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kai is taking pictures of a collection of seashells with his Kaimera at the beach. Suddenly, a Horn-Eyed Ghost Crab appears and moves closer to Kais feet, startling him. Kai calms down and notice the harmless creature loses one of its claws. Kai felt sympathy before the animal runs away from him. He didnt manage to catch up to it, and then Kai notices several holes on the beach near the shore. Back in the garden, Hero had digging holes across the garden. Leo sees this and chase Hero away and tells him to stop digging. Hero then digs back a hole that Katie had just filled in, causing a tired Katie to puts down her shovel and sits down. Leo throws a ball towards the hole to distract Hero, causing Hero to catch it and burying into the hole. As the duo catch their breath, Leos watch starts to beeps, revealing a call from Kai. Kai tells them about the holes and the crab at the beach, then shares the picture to the Junior Rangers. They get into the treehouse and Katie examines it with her computer, explaining that its a Horn-Eyed Ghost Crab. Suddenly a group of seagulls appear to threaten the crab, so the Rangers grab their backpack and rush towards Kais position by riding PlatypusOne. Once they arrived, they see Kai is running around the beach and waves his arms to dismiss the flock of seagulls that been circling the sky above the crab thats been hiding behind a rock. Katie tells Kai its not working, to which Hero even tries to help by barking and flaunting at the seagulls.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pats delivering a bucking bronco. But hell need Dr Gilbertsons lassoing skills first!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has an extra special delivery today - an actual pop star!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The playful rabbit wants to draw a big picture, so Flop finds him some chalk to create a stripy, spotty, zig-zag dinosaur on the pavement

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula find a potato in Amma’s vegetable patch with a comical ‘face’, so they take it under their wing, naming it “Nosey”. The two children look after Nosey and show him around the crèche but unfortunately Nosey goes down the slide too quickly and his ‘nose’ falls off. Amma shows them how to plant both bits of potato so that they can grow new potatoes.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: In the absence of a real plaster, Bing makes one out of sticky tape, but it’s so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald offers to watch Roderick Robots mechanical cat, Tinsel while Roderick gets a buff and shine at the Barber Shop. Oswald thinks it will be easy, but Tinsels mischievous antics drive him to distraction. The naughty cat runs away and, as he searches for her, Oswald realises that not all pets are as good as Weenie.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald, Weenie and Madame Butterfly discover a huge egg in the park. Realising it has fallen from a nest high up in a tree and not seeing the mother bird anywhere, a caring Oswald decides to take the egg home to his flat where it will be safe. Meanwhile Madame Butterfly will wait at the nest to tell the mother bird where her egg is. Oswald soon discovers that looking after such a delicate egg is not easy. When he finally reaches the safety of his flat, the egg hatches and the Me Ta Bird chick is reunited with her mother.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Film director, Carl Parker, has commissioned Bob and his team to build the set and rocket for a movie – Space Robots 3. The clock is ticking, as they need to release it before Christmas. Leo reveals to Scoop he has aspirations to act, whilst Carl seems to have little control over his remote controlled robot D11D that keeps spooking Muck and running over Wendy’s toe. Saffi, who is hanging around the studio gates, is a big fan of D11D which leads an eager-to-impress Leo to claim he will be acting in the film, not just building sets. Leo with Scoop’s help then tries to get the director’s attention in various scenes whilst Bob’s team and the director are trying to get the set and rocket ready for filming. Leo decides to give up but then has an idea. The next morning, the first day’s filming is due to start but Leo is nowhere to be seen. Carl calls action on the first scene (between D11D and a much larger robot.)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob and the team are asked to build a set for movie-star Dash Lightning’s new film, Muck thinks that his dreams have come true. Dash Lightning is Mucks’ hero, so he decides that he wants to meet him whilst working at Spring City Studios. But when Muck gets distracted with trying to find his hero, he doesn’t pay attention to any of the jobs he is doing. On racing to meet his hero, Muck clips the set’s backdrop and he doesn’t wait to check the pyrotechnic lights, causing them to fall towards the studio-lighting crane. Just as the director calls action, the set falls apart and the pyrotechnics explode towards the lights, risking a fire.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare And Little Field Mouse go on an adventurous journey through the woods in search of a special Autumn leaf. They leave a trail of acorns to find their way home, but Little Grey Squirrel unwittingly collects the acorns and leaves them all lost in the woods. Luckily he is able to help when he climbs to the treetops and spies the meadow in the distance.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Spring is coming and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse are very brave and go on a journey through the meadow to discover the source of a mysterious – and slightly spooky - creaking sound. They follow the clues to discover… it’s the frozen lake melting, and singing as it does!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse pick lots of delicious strawberries. Little Nutbrown Hare eats all his and runs out so Little Field Mouse shares hers with him. When he goes to collect some more for his friend he eats them all too. Little Field Mouse shows him how to eat them really slowly to make them last longer.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy and Finlay can hear some scary noises in the Nursery. Who is making the scary sounds?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Something knocks Sgt. Murphy’s hat off his head, chops the tops of Baker Humperdink’s baguettes, and sheers a path through a flower bed. Although no one saw anything, they all heard it make the same whoop whoop whoop sound. Putting the clues together, Huckle, Sally and Lowly figure out that it was Vanderbuilt’s new, out of control, boomerang./The mysterious disappearance of Mayor Fox leaves Huckle and the gang on an important search.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy discovers his socks are in the washing machine! This makes him wonder how a washing machine knows what to do so he goes to Okido to find out… Messy is just about to land in Okido as usual when he is caught mid-air by Zam’s new camping invention: Camperbot! “Are we going camping?” asks Messy, still held upside down. Zoe and Felix excitedly tell Messy that they are going to test out Camperbot up on Giant Mountain. Felix and Zoe show Messy what Camperbot can do, but when Messy asks it for a sock sandwich it replies that it is “not programmed” to do that… “Not programmed?!” mimics Messy, questioningly.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy has just woken up and is looking for his sock breakfast, but it is under his toy box and he can’t reach, or move it… He needs to know how to move heavy things, and the best place to find out the answer is Okido! When he arrives Zoe and Felix are also trying to move a heavy box! They need to go to the recycling centre today. So they all go to Zam and Zim to find out the best way to do it. Zim, Zam and Zoom are sunbathing and enjoying Zam’s latest invention when the three arrive.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apples groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pups obvious dislike of performing in public. Its up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesnt want to do.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry cant find one of his red cowboy socks - the ones with a white fringe.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Charlie lends Harry her Sergeant Shout toy for the weekend, Harry promises not to let it leave in his bedroom.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo catches a raccoon digging around in his trash. The Junior Rangers take the raccoon back to the forest where it can find its own food. However, some unfriendly raccoons make things difficult for Leo and company...

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: The excitement continues for Thomas And his friends in Series 19. Thomas causes an accident by being silly, blaming an imaginary engine named Geoffrey, but then proves he is a good friend by helping Hiro. Elsewhere, Diesel is visited by some ghostly Christmas engines, Percy struggles to keep track of his woolly cargo and the engines work as a team to rescue a stranded whale.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Stephen is the oldest engine on the Island of Sodor and people love to see him, so sometimes he makes special journeys round the island. He’s still called the Rocket, though he’s much slower than the other engines. Sometimes they have to slow down for him, which Gordon in particular doesn’t like. But it’s because Stephen travels so slowly that he notices that the Suspension Bridge is damaged and manages to alert the other engines in time to avoid a disaster!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu has promised Mr. Toramento to help him clean up the beach. The problem is that he has more important things to do, like taking the fire truck ride that David promised him. Or even more urgently, helping his firefighting heroes find the fire truck keys that David lost. So, he messes up his work, until he realizes that its better to do things right. At the end he eventually finds the keys and gets his fire truck ride.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu wants to set up a special birthday party for Fume at the pizzeria, and to offer him his favorite pizza. Unfortunately, Mr. Guellec has hurt his arm and he cant harvest the tomatoes that the pizza sauce requires. With Stellas help, Grisu turns into a farmer but its not an easy task to harvest Guellecs high tomato plants for such a tiny dragon. Fortunately, Grisu has plenty of ideas: if you cant reach the tomatoes, try to make the tomatoes reaching you!And after having burnt the cart he needs to deliver the tomatoes in time, Grisu finds a way to achieve his mission by creating the first rolling catamaran!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare follows some unusual tracks in the snow that eventually lead him to a shy little spotty deer. He plays with his new friend every day, until she has to leave again with her mother to search for food. Little Nutbrown Hare is sad to see her go, but he’s also glad that he has friends that stay in the meadow all year round.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The snow in the meadow is so deep that Little Nutbrown Hare has to stay under the Old Oak tree. Wondering what he is going to do all day in deep snow and with no one to play with, his imagination soon takes over as he creates new kinds of fun. By the time his friends reach him, Little Nutbrown Hare can’t believe how the time has flown!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie,in order to beat Scoutbadger in a race, entrusts her precious necklace to Woodsy. However she does not fully trust him even if he does swear to look after it well. However, the Tomcats decide to steal the necklace. In order to get it back and prove to Rosie that he deserves her trust, Woodsy gives in to the Tomcat’s blackmail and even takes some foolhardy risks…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: While working at Fixham Campsite, Dizzy wants to camp out with Leo and the Spring City Rockets till she’s put off by the creepy crawlies. She later regrets her decision and returns with Scoop and Muck but they are frightened by the spooky story Leo is telling and the Rockets think they are the creatures from his story. Everyone panics and the build is damaged as they flee. Dizzy gets her wheel stuck in a ditch and is left behind.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Sports guru Skye Sampson asks Bob to build a 100 metre zip-line for her new fitness program. Its a job that Leo should love to help with, but he seems very distracted. Leo is put in charge of finishing the launch platform and fixing the zip-line, but he keeps making mistakes and wonders if he is up to the job. Lofty tries to convince Leo of how well theyre doing, but when the zip-line comes loose its the last straw. Leo says he should give up being a builder. Scoop and Lofty panic that Leo is going to leave the team – they decide they must make things right! But in their attempts to fix the platform they end up demolishing it instead.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids search for the owner of a sketchbook that contains drawings done from a high point of view. After determining the artist wasnt drawing at the top of a ladder or up in a tree, they discover the sketchbook belongs to one of Busytowns tallest residents, Jeremy Giraffe. / Huckle and gang investigate a strange temperature drop which turns Busytowns summer to winter.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A barn owl scares Leo in the garden. The Junior Rangers depart for the grasslands to find a better hunting place for the barn owl.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo comes across a baby Asian elephant while planting an apple tree. To find the elephant’s mother, the Junior Rangers explore the lowland forest.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the first day of school! But Simon doesn’t want to go! His parents try and reassure him, telling him about all the cool things that will go on in school but all Simon can say is “No way!” The next morning, leaving mommy and daddy in front of the school gates is super difficult. But as the day progresses, Simon realizes all the great things that go on at school: the really nice teacher, reuniting with all his friends and even the cafeteria! So when Mommy and Daddy come to pick him up and take him home at the end of the say all he can say is “No way!”

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry and Dolly are planting sunflowers on a spring day. They take care of the flowers carefully as they emerge from the ground and grow tall. The two friends are very happy. Unfortunately the joy does not last long; someone damaged the flowers.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: There will be a puppet show in the middle of the forest. Berry, Dolly, Balthazar and Eddy also get going to watch the show. Eddy and Balthazar had a fight over a pebble when Eddy, the potato beetle, felt down. Oh my!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One day, Egon happily played with his new black scooter. The others also wants to try it but Egon not in the mood for sharing at all!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, Stanley, Balthazar, Flutter and Bubble are hiking in the forest on a beautiful autumn day. Suddenly they recognized that someone is crying in the bush. They found a mushroom without his hat. The friends immediately start to help him.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing the talking lettuce game on Flops phone when he drops the phone and accidentally breaks it

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends put on a show in the park. After Coco’s dance, Pando’s song and Sula’s acrobatics display everyone is excited to see Bing’s finale. When he gets up on the stage Bing is overcome with stage fright so his friends, and rainbow fairy mice, come to the rescue.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing tries to show Sula she doesnt need to wear earmuffs to watch the fireworks but when a loud bang sends Bing flying, he doesnt think they are such a bad idea!

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: In Tildas garden, Robin and another robin are quarrelling over an earthworm. Tilda wants to save the poor worm and distracts the birds by suggesting a competition. First, the robins should compete at cherry stone-spitting. This ends in a draw and Tilda sets the next task: pecking out a pattern in a leaf. Both birds peck out a star, so its a another tie.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: One chilly, windy day, Tilda wants to visit her friend Molly. On her way across the fields, she meets Patrick the sheep, whos got a cold. Tilda immediately informs Molly and together the two mice knit Patrick a nice warm scarf. Patrick is overjoyed, but now all the other sheep want scarves too. Now Tilda and Molly have to call her friends in to help.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda is a clever and intelligent mouse who lives in a tiny house at the base of the church wall with her pet Snaily and her best friends.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: You Summer in the meadow is a great time to find tasty snacks to eat. Big Nutbrown Hare seems to know all the best tricks and hiding spots for the yummy treats and Little Nutbrown Hare can’t help but wish he was as big and smart as his father. However, he soon finds out that there are some things a little Nutbrown Hare can teach a Big Nutbrown Hare.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On Summer’s hottest night Little Nutbrown Hare finds it hard to sleep. When a swim in the river isn’t enough to cool him down, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends ask Little White Owl to tell them a really cold and sleepy bedtime story. Will she come up with a story that can make them feel cool and finally get Little Nutbrown Hare off to sleep?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is impressed by Blue Bird’s description of a flowery field that looks just like a sea of colour from her bird’s eye view. He visits the field with Big Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse, and they discover that everyone has their own unique view of the field, and each one is special in its own way.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Koko is put in charge of Wilson and Brewster. The team has to complete a newspaper round by a certain time. Koko nearly fails and learns that being bossy isn’t the best way to lead. She tries again, using her team members’ strengths instead and in the end shares her badge with Wilson and Brewster. After all – they’re a team!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari was practicing her recording skill, imitating the bird sounds as she relaxing in the forest. Suddenly, she hears some whistles, squeals and clicks from a far. She investigates the sound through the bushes and come across a Mother Tapir and its baby. Zari never seen these anything like this before so she try approaching the animals. All of the sudden, a leopard appears and targets the mother Tapir. Zari wants to help so she blows her recorder to scare the animal off. Her plan works but it also causes the baby Tapir to run away on another direction than its mother. Zari felt worried for the baby Tapir and calls on the Junior Ranger. In the garden, Leo And Katie are deciding which 2 types of carpets to put in their treehouse. They were discussing on which carpet pattern is more good. They cant decide and let Hero to help them pick an answer. Suddenly, they get interrupt by Zari whos asking them to help with the poor lost baby Tapir. After learning the information from Zaris picture and learn its a Malayan Tapir, the Junior Rangers grab their backpack and head out to help Zari. The Junior Rangers rode PlatypusOne and arrive in the forest. There, they meet up with Zari and the mother Malayan Tapir. The mother Malayan Tapir was sad and begin to make whistling and clicking noise to reach to her baby. Zari told the Junior Rangers those were the sound that she heard earlier. Zari then spots a brown furry spotted animal from a far and tell them to see if its the baby Tapir theyre searching for. Eventually it is reveal to be a Malayan mouse deer.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle was lounging on the beach, stargazing with his toy kangaroo Stella as he admiring the peaceful moment. Then he was interrupted by a fallen coconut. Startled by the sound, Kyle grab his flashlight to check out. Turns out a coconut has fallen and it nearby fallen besides him. Unknowing to him, a big coconut crab climbs down behind him. He turns around and was surprise. He then realize its a crab and gets fascinated by it. The crab then immediately goes down and eat the opened coconut. Kyle take the picture and send it to the Rangers. Back at the base, Katie is showing Leo of the new night vision feature she has on her tablet. Katie points her tablet elsewhere and they see 2 white dots running towards them from the garden forest, ultimately reveals it to be Hero. Leo pets Hero before receiving a call from Kyle. Kyle explain on the crab he discovers, currently towering over a coconut at the moment. Katie analyses the picture and learn its a Coconut Crab. After learning of the animal, Leo has a safety concern for the beach-goers and suggest they go there to put signs on the beach. The Ranger equip their gear and ride PlatypusOne to meet up with Kyle. At the beach, the Rangers sees Kyle observing the coconut crab. They have a discussion on how to making the wooden sign.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Picorette the hen has taken over the kids’ swing, using it as a perch. So T’choupi and Nina decide to build her a swing of her own. But getting Picorette to agree to change perches is another matter… Luckily, they’re able to coax her, with food!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are planning to go on a picnic with Nina’s donkey Coquelicot but the animal is stubbornly refusing to leave its enclosure! programme.desc: Grandma offers Sam and Julia a curious calendar representing the Mouse Mansion, each numbered window revealing an apartment the way it was long ago when its inhabitant first arrived.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Gordon is going about his usual business when something extraordinary happens – he can’t stop giggling! What starts as a little chuckle soon turns into full blown hysterics and… Gordon HATES IT! The more he tries to stop laughing, the worse it gets and he’s convinced if Sir Topham Hatt/Fat Controller sees him in this ‘silly’ state, he’ll take the Express from him and give him ‘silly’ jobs instead. Desperately, he heads to Steam Works to be fixed, where he learns that a little bit of laughter doesn’t do anybody any harm!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family

programme.desc: For Sketcky, imitating a baby is easy! One just needs to cry. However, succeeding in comforting him is more complicated. Doodleboo surely has an idea of Riddleboo that can help them calm the crying baby.

programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave get creative, drawing the flowers in Hatty’s garden - and each other. Copying shapes, lines and matching colours they are soon picture perfect!

programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare tries to jump high enough to reach a last Autumn apple on a high branch. Unable to reach it, even with the help of Little Field Mouse, he gives up. programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare falls into a muddy Autumn puddle and is delighted when he startles Little Grey Squirrel, who doesn’t recognize him at first. But they weren’t ready for Little Field Mouse, who works out a clever way of surprising her friends even more.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You

Once she finds out they actually belong Little Grey Squirrel, she has to decide whether to give them back or keep them.

programme.title: Bing Bunny

programme.desc: One night Berry is already in his bed, when he hears some strange noise. First he doesnt care, but the noise just getting louder. Finally he opens the door when the little green worm appeared. Long time no see friend just arrived.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Mouse wants Kipper to push her along on a roller skate. He’s got a better idea. Why don’t they play Hide and Seek? programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: As a young fisherman, GrandPa was thanked by a king for having saved him from the pirates. The monarch offered him two large rubies that he hid in the residence. Can Sam and Julia find them?

programme.desc: Ida asks Molly, if she can look after her duckling Alina. But today of all days, Alina wants to learn how to fly and gets herself in some risky situations – and so Molly has to take some risks too.

programme.desc: It’s the night and The Triplets and Grandpa are at the beach to observe the night of the shooting stars. The Triplets are really really excited and ask a lot of questions to Grandpa. He explains to them that when you discover a new star you can name it after yourself, and when you see a shooting star you must make a wish. When they see their first shooting star, the Triplets wish for exactly the same thing, to have their own little star, The Triplet’s star!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: In Grandpa’s garden, Turbulent is fascinated by the super heroes’ stories he can read in his book. He wishes too to be a Kind Vigilante who saves the lovely and the helpless. Unfortunately, every time he tries to save someone, his sister who stucked her kite in a tree or his brother who is afraid of a spider for example, Grandpa always comes first and fixes the problem. When Turbulent was at the most discouraging point, a new villain appears ant kidnap all the people he loves, the Kind Vigilante is back in business!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures

programme.desc: A Fire Drill at school frightens Alan, an autistic classmate of Caillous. Caillou helps him through it, struggles a little to navigate Alans response to being scared.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Diesel is not a very helpful engine, but at Christmas, when there is so much extra work to be done, his unhelpfulness is really unwelcome and unkind, especially when he refuses to stop for Paxton who has been derailed. Thomas decides to help Diesel see the error of his ways. Over the course of the next few days Diesel is visited by what appear to be ‘ghostly engines’ who remind him just how unhelpful he has been in the past, the joy helping others can bring at Christmas and the danger that if you don’t help others they might not come to help you when you really need them. When Diesel becomes derailed himself and fears that he could be abandoned the message finally hits home.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Hodge gets a new job cleaning windows on the high-­‐rise buildings in the city. He is taking over from Old Puffer Pete who shows him what to do. Then Hodge gets stuck high up in the air when the window-­‐cleaning riser platform breaks down. Eddie abseils the side of the building and attempts to fix the motor, but it is well and truly jammed. Even rescue expert Jackman doesn’t have a clue how to get Hodge down.

programme.title: Chuggington

Zack and Jackman try to pull him out, but even two strong chuggers aren’t enough to stop him from slipping further into the water.

Zari wants to share the new bird she discover. The Junior Rangers goes up in their treehouse to learn more and its called the Baya Weaver bird. As they were discussing, Zari informs the Junior Rangers on the threat that 2 lizard causing as they suddenly approach the birds. The Junior Rangers meets up with Zari to help her. When they arrived, Zari infrom them that the lizards went away and the baby birds are safe, but their nest has been destroyed. The Baya Weaver mother bird is still upset and chirps angrily at Zari. Leo comes up with an idea and offer the bird with some seeds. This calms the mother bird down. Afterwards, Zari and Katie hurriedly finish the bed of leabes and put the Baya Weaver babies into it, causing the Baya Weaver mother bird to be more friendly. The Junior Rangers then agree in rebuilding the old nest with the material around but they werent manage to build it properly and made it untidy, causing the mother Baya Weaver unwilling to be in the nest. Ranger Rocky appears and the Hunior Ranger explain the situation and ask for help.

programme.desc: Sula and Amma have come to Bings house for lunch but there are no carrots so Flop pops to the shop to get some. Bing stays behind but its not long before he starts to miss Flop. Missing Flop... its a Bing thing!

By the end of the day they are glad to be back on dry land.

Kai has a holographic GPS to locate the drone and PlatypusOne dives further underwater. Hero gets distracted by a fish and try to chase it, before returning to the group afterwards. programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari is bird-watching with her binoculars and then she takes notices a strange shaped nest from a new bird she havent learn of, picking her interest. The bird that built the nest approach her, aggresively chirps at her and Zari tries to befriend the bird. In the garden, Leo And Katie are playing ;parachuting with their jet packs to land on a cardboard box marked with an X. They are having fun but Leo then pulls the cardboard away on the last second, causing Leo to land on his bum. As Leo picks himself up, they receive a call from Zari. Zari wants to share the new bird she discover. The Junior Rangers goes up in their treehouse to learn more and its called the Baya Weaver bird. As they were discussing, Zari informs the Junior Rangers on the threat that 2 lizard causing as they suddenly approach the birds. The Junior Rangers meets up with Zari to help her. When they arrived, Zari infrom them that the lizards went away and the baby birds are safe, but their nest has been destroyed. The Baya Weaver mother bird is still upset and chirps angrily at Zari. Leo comes up with an idea and offer the bird with some seeds. This calms the mother bird down. Afterwards, Zari and Katie hurriedly finish the bed of leabes and put the Baya Weaver babies into it, causing the Baya Weaver mother bird to be more friendly. The Junior Rangers then agree in rebuilding the old nest with the material around but they werent manage to build it properly and made it untidy, causing the mother Baya Weaver unwilling to be in the nest. Ranger Rocky appears and the Hunior Ranger explain the situation and ask for help.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pats a bit nervous at meeting the Duchess of Pencaster! A very special delivery indeed!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat must deliver a new cow to Alf, but Daisy has a habit of running away.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing loves Arlo the cat. They are friends. Bing strokes the kitty and they play hide and seek, but what happens when Bing meets a cat that isnt as friendly?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop find a patch of fluffy dandelions and blow all but one. Bing takes the last one to give to Sula but when she hugs him to say hello, the dandelion blows away.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is vooshing with Hoppity around the garden, making him fly higher and higher. With one particularly enthusiastic throw Hoppity disappears. After a hunt, Bing finds Hoppity in the washing up bowl and gets upset because a wet, mucky Hoppity just doesn’t feel right.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends play Nature Explorers in Ammas garden by spinning a giant colour wheel and then finding something of that colour in the garden.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has enough money to buy one thing in Padgets shop but he finds it hard to choose between all the lovely things. After much deliberation Bing chooses a campervan but on the way home he begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald and Daisy are making sticky honey buns, but Daisy doesn’t follow the recipe properly and they end up getting stuck to the dough -- and each other! -- instead. They ask Henry for help, and he ends up getting stuck as well. The three then head through Big City, and everyone they meet somehow ends up getting stuck, too. But when they think that it couldn’t get much worse, it starts to rain! Oswald suddenly realises that they can become unstuck by standing in the rain and sure enough the sticky dough gets washed away.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Pongo the Friendly Dragon is sad because he doesn’t have anyone his size to play with and can’t enjoy activities like riding on the seesaw. Feeling sorry for his friend, Oswald finds the perfect match for Pongo - Laverne the White Elephant - but Pongo is too shy to say hello to her. Oswald devises ways to get them together, but the clumsy Pongo keeps ruining his efforts. Finally Oswald manoeuvres both Pongo and Laverne into the basket of a hot-air balloon and sets them adrift, and they float off together, friends at last.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Jenny Dobbs commissions Bob and team to build Komodo Island with a walkway/bridge for the public to gain a better view of the Komodo Dragons. Muck discovers he is terrified of the Komodos so is set to work clearing out their old enclosure (without his knowledge) instead. When he discovers some eggs buried in the earth there he braves returning to the Island to ask Jenny what to do with them. But a Komodo hisses at him and Muck is spooked - he backs into part of the walkway causing it to collapse and leaving Leo dangling in mid air from a safety harness. When Muck sees the Komodo apparently climbing the tree to attack Leo he overcomes his fears to go back and save him.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s the Machine’s Check Up Day; a day when Curtis the mechanic comes to check their mechanics and engines are all working properly! Scoop boast he’s going to get ‘top marks’ for his check-up. Lofty is worried he won’t get any. After Scoop, Lofty and Muck have a Jet-Wash, Bob calls Curtis to tell him they’re ready but Scoop realises his orange emergency light is broken and thinks he won’t get ‘top marks’. He panics and decides to hide until Curtis has gone! Scoop scours the Yard for somewhere to hide – but in the process makes himself muddy again. Then he breaks the glass in his side mirror before tearing his rear tyre mud flap. Eventually Bob finds Scoop hiding behind a pile of cement bags, looking dishevelled and sorry for himself! Bob and Wendy ‘fix’ Scoop so he’s ready for his check-up. Lofty is still worried and nervous about being examined.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare makes a slippery slide from a pile of snow and has so much fun he decides to keep it a secret and play with it all by himself. But he soon gets bored playing by himself, and invites his friends to play. They build bigger and curvier slides together and slide faster and faster. Little Nutbrown Hare learns it’s lots more fun to shares the joy with his friends.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After Big Nutbrown Hare shows Little Nutbrown Hare a special place where his voice echoes, he and Little Field Mouse play a game of Try to find me with Little Redwood Fox and Little Grey Squirrel. They hide in the ravine and as their voices bounce off the rocky walls, their friends have a very tricky time trying to find them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare, Little Field Mouse and Big Nutbrown Hare go up to high meadow with Big Nutbrown Hare they get caught in the mist. It’s a little scary so they hold hands and pass the time by playing guessing games. As the mist starts to lift, they see a beautiful circle rainbow around the sun.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: The class are learning about music. Can you guess what instruments they are playing?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to prove to Pig Will and Pig Won’t that the figure they saw wearing a strange yellow suit and helmet is not a spaceman from another planet. The clues finally lead them to the realization that it was really Granny Goodpig wearing her yellow suit to protect her while she collected honey from her beehives./ Someone took all the red roses from Granny Goats garden leaving Huckle and gang puzzled.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy has just woken up and is looking for his sock breakfast, but it is under his toy box and he can’t reach, or move it… He needs to know how to move heavy things, and the best place to find out the answer is Okido! When he arrives Zoe and Felix are also trying to move a heavy box! They need to go to the recycling centre today. So they all go to Zam and Zim to find out the best way to do it. Zim, Zam and Zoom are sunbathing and enjoying Zam’s latest invention when the three arrive.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world Messy walks into the bathroom and is horrified to find it clean! It’s not right for a Messy Monster at all. “Why do you have to clean things anyway?” He asks himself. And he goes to Okido to find out! When he arrives Felix and Zoe are at the top of their treehouse and there is a noisy racket going on! They don’t know what it could be so they skidoodle to go and have a look. When they arrive in the centre of Okido there are funny little things making lots of noise hurtling around the streets and sending the Okidinians into chaos!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When a simple tune Cherry composes goes viral on the Berryweb, Cherry quickly gets fed up with everyone listening to this song, everywhere, all the time. She goes to comic lengths to get some peace so she can compose the song shes suppose to write for the Queen of Berryvania.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry receives a box of magic tricks for Christmas but is unable to create any magic.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry is scared of going to the dentist, but when Trike complains that his horn is sore Harry insists that Trike goes to the Horntist in Dino World.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A yellow-eyed penguin wanders into Hero’s kennel. The Junior Rangers head to New Zealand to find the penguin’s home, but can they prevent tourists from disturbing yellow-eyed penguins on the beach?

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Bertie, Thomas and Spencer get into a debate about how many wheels is best. Bertie has four wheels, Thomas has six and Spencer is very proud of his twelve. But when Spencer breaks down while taking the Duke and Duchess to Callan Castle, Thomas must transport his passengers instead. Then Thomas finds the track blocked and Bertie takes over. And when Bertie has a flat tyre who should turn up, but the Thin Controller on his bicycle. Surely the Duke and Duchess can’t ride to Callan Castle on his bike! Luckily, the Thin Controller has a better idea about how to help.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: On match days Thomas is a very popular engine, because the Sodor football team wear blue. One match day a mainland team come to the island wearing red, and they cheer James because he is red too. Soon the two engines are competing with each other over who can bring the fans to the match faster. But by refusing to pick up supporters wearing the wrong colours, James ends up leaving the rival football team at the station since they are not yet wearing their kit and Thomas rushes right past the Fat Controller who is supposed to be the match referee. In all the confusion and delay there might not be a match at all!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Professor Smeraldo, in the middle of a pyramid exploration, calls Fume to have some information about Thudnose, a pharaoh who was nicknamed ""The Dragon Pharaoh"". Unfornutately, the video communication is not good and is quickly cut off. Grisù and Fume go to Egypt to give Smeraldo a hand. Unfortunately, they dont know how to get into the pyramid to meet him, so they have no other choice than find their way all by themselves, like Egyptologist. Grisu manages to use and decrypt the pharaohs secret motto. They finally find Smeraldo. Grisu helps him to overcome the final obstacle to eventually discover the marvelous sarcophagus of Thudnose!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu and Stella are wandering in the harbour eating an ice-cream. David arrives by car, he comes to see his friend Olivier, a sailor whose expedition has just fallen through. Olivier was supposed to go sailing and clear up the mystery of the “Mermaid pass” but his teammates have withdrawn at the last minute. Fortunately, Grisu can replace them.And here are Olivier and Grisu leaving on the planned expedition. But they didnt notice that Stella is also on board, locked in a closet in spite of herself.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On a cold but sunny morning in the middle of Winter, Little Nutbrown Hare discovers his friends ice-skating on the frozen pond. He decides to give it a try but slips, slops and slides all over the ice. Will he persevere for long enough to be able to perfect his own unique style, or will he be put off by the natural skill of his friends?

programme.title: Wagner´s Jews
programme.desc: Richard Wagner was notoriously anti-Semitic, and his writings on Jews were later embraced by Hitler and the Nazis. But for years, many of Wagner‘s closest associates were Jews - young musicians who became personally devoted to him, and provided crucial help to his work and career. Why were they drawn to him? And how could Wagner even accept their embrace? These questions are at the heart of ‘Wagner‘s Jews’, the first film to focus on Wagner‘s complex personal relationships with Jews. Filmed on location in Germany, Switzerland, and Italy, ‘Wagner‘s Jews’ reveals this remarkable story through archival sources, re-enactments, interviews, and performances of original musical works by Wagner‘s Jewish colleagues. Featuring Zubin Mehta and Leon Botstein among others, the film also explores the ongoing controversy over performing Wagner‘s music in Israel. The same questions asked in Wagner‘s time still resonate today: is it possible to separate the art from its creator? Can sublime music transcend prejudice and bigotry, and the weight of history?Subtitles available for this program with your remote controlSubtítulos disponibles para este programa con su control remoto

programme.title: The Lost Paradise, a portrait of Arvo Part
programme.desc: He is the most performed contemporary composer in the world. Nevertheless, he also rarely ventures out in public, keeps quiet about his music, feels at home in the forests of Estonia and generates therewith – perhaps involuntarily – the impression of a recluse, which is attributed to him again and again: Arvo Part.The Estonian composer, who will celebrate his 90th birthday on September 11, 2025, verily exudes even solely by his appearance an aura of a mystic or an ascetic. He himself says: “I am no prophet, no cardinal, not a monk, not even a vegetarian.” But he is without a doubt a devout man, who has been a member of the Russian Orthodox Church since 1970, and under pressure from the Soviet apparatus of power was forced to leave his native Estonia in 1980. Via Vienna he arrived in Berlin, which for the next 30 years would become his second home and also the starting point for his international career.“The Lost Paradise” is the first international documentary about Arvo Part. It is quite an astonishment that such a shy artist has given his consent to be accompanied by a camera for an entire year: In his native Estonia, travelling to Germany, Italy, and Japan, where Part received the Praemium Imperiale, the world’s most prestigious award in the field of music, in October 2014.The film is framed by the identically named stage production “Adam’s Passion,” featuring three key works by Arvo Part, which American director Robert Wilson brought to the stage in May 2015 in a former submarine factory, the “Noblessner Foundry” in Tallinn.

programme.title: Richard Strauss et ses heroïnes
programme.desc: Divorce! After six years of marriage the choleric and chronically jealous Pauline, daughter of a general, has had enough of Richard Strauss. Pauline always knew it: her husband who at 36 is celebrated as the most important living German composer across the globe is cheating on her. His congeniality and moral uprightness is just a mask! Are his inspirations for the erotic escapades which are the basis of several of his tone poems and songs based on the love affairs of the artist? The film Richard Strauss and his Heroines goes on an exciting journey discovering the women in Strauss’ life. At the focus is primarily his relationship with Pauline, to whom he was married for over 55 years up to his death. Until today she applies as a harridan who often embarrassed her husband in public. It hereby falls under the table that Strauss at the beginning and the end of his relationship composed his finest songs for the trained singer who gave up her career for him and covered his back for the rest of his life. What was it that made the broken old man, who experienced the most varied of epochs in German history, from the Empire to the Nazi dictatorship to the post-war period, write in 1948 in his final song (“At Sunset”) one of the most moving declarations of love in the history of music: “We have through sorrow and joy gone hand in hand”? We visit Strauss last surviving grandchild in Garmisch and we meet the great Strauss singers Brigitte Fassbaender, Renee Fleming, Dame Gwyneth Jones and Christa Ludwig, who report on their famous Strauss roles. With the conductor Franz Welser-Most we research the secret of Strauss’ instrumentation genius.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Rachmaninov revisited
programme.desc: Celebrated in his day not only as a great composer, Sergei Rachmaninov was also admired as an outstanding pianist who was a peerless interpreter of his own works including the piano concerti and the Rhapsody on a Theme by Paganini.It is well known that he was in effect the sole pianist capable of performing his most demanding Third Piano Concerto and his performances and recording of the concerto came to be considered as the definitive ones. The relationship between performance, interpretation, and Rachmaninov’s own life is addressed in this film by young pianists. They explore the evolution of interpretation over the past few decades with brief excerpts of recordings by Rachmaninov as contrasted with contemporary performances by today’s well-known young pianists as they comment on the differences (or similarities) of their approach.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: La Grande Danza - Aterballetto in Milan
programme.desc: Aterballetto is the principal producing and touring dance company in Italy. They are well-known for their ability to shift their style across a wide range of musical genres, from classical to pop and jazz. Jiří Pokorny‘s ‘Words and Space’ is a metaphor of an intrapersonal speech, a book full of floating stories. It is personal, intimate, and very poetic.

programme.title: Great Conductors: Pierre Boulez - Emotion and Analysis
programme.desc: The conductor Pierre Boulez described his relationship with Bela Bartok (1881-1945) as a "sympathy between musicians": both belong to the 20th centurys most influential artists. A key work of Bartok is the ‘Concerto for Orchestra’, which was premiered in Boston in 1944. The Film ‘Emotion and Analysis’ follows Pierre Boulez in his rehearsals of this composition with the Berlin Philharmonic in the spectacular setting of the monastery Mosteiro dos Jeronimos in Lisbon. Pierre Boulez explains in a series of interviews the historical origins of Bartoks late work, his own personal style of interpretation and his role as conductor as well as his love of composing.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Från att bevittna en anmarkningsvard sidledes sjosattning av ett fartyg och utforska landets storsta oversvamningsbarriar till att upptacka det geniala vattenhanteringssystemet bakom Kinderdijks historiska vaderkvarnar – vi beger oss till Nederlanderna for att djupdyka i den imponerande briljansen hos hollandsk ingenjorskonst.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna i Port Protection staller alltid upp nar de ser att en granne behover hjalp. Idag hjalper Dave och Mike Veronica att falla några farliga trad, Squibb hjalper Oliver och Breanna att forbattra sitt flytande hus, Sam hjalper sin son med sasongens sista laxfiske och Curly kontrollerar deras vattenforsorjning.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Våren har kommit och Margot ger sig ut for att leta efter bjorn – men hamnar oga mot oga med en annu mer formidabel naturkraft. Billy drar nytta av det varmare vadret och påborjar arbetet med några valbehovliga uppgraderingar av stugan. Matty blir en riktig ”hillbilly” med sina planer på den ultimata frysboxen i skogen, och Emilie och Gilbert borjar arbeta på en ”Shabotwan” – en traditionell byggnad som de hoppas kunna fardigstalla innan vårens gåsjakt borjar.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot står infor en rad åskvader och gor en sista kraftanstrangning for att fardigstalla sitt dromhus i Yukon. Billy bygger en grill i vildmarken – det sista steget i hans mål att forvandla sin enkla bostad till det perfekta vildmarkshemmet. Med sommaren precis runt hornet vidtar Matty åtgarder for att uppgradera sitt boende vid vattnet. Och Emilie och Gilbert kampar mot snon under den sena sasongen nar de skyndar sig att fardigstalla sin stuga i vildmarken innan några mycket speciella gaster anlander.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: I detta avsnitt av Food Factory USA: Del Montes konserverade grona bonor plockas och konserveras alltid samma dag i syfte att hålla bonorna så farska som mojligt; det kravs en toppmodern anlaggning for att framstalla tonvis med perfekt farfallepasta; och sedan upptacker vi ett unikt iste innehållandes reggaens lugnande effekt.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: I detta avsnitt av Food Factory USA: Ta reda på vad det ar som gor Red Fusion-smoothien så god; detta bageri i Wisconsin framstaller 400 000 kanelsnurror dagligen; och medarbetarna på Ben And Jerrys glassfabrik tar hem over 1,5 liter gratisglass om dagen.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: På Australiens mest trafikerade flygplats, som ar i drift dygnet runt, stoppar ett stromavbrott all verksamhet och resursansvarige Andrew forsoker återstalla strommen inom en timme. Flygledaren Melissa hanterar upp till 700 flygningar per dag. Ett flyg måste tomma sin bransletank och återvanda till flygplatsen efter start på grund av ett fel på motorn.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: En tidig morgonjakt med Fajardo Air and Marine-enheten slutar med att narkotikasmugglare med over 900 kilo kokain ombord på sin båt grips. Misstankta smugglare grips i ett fartyg med slackta ljus i Amerikanska Jungfruoarna med ett vapen ombord. Air and Marine Operations och brottsbekampande myndigheter i hela Karibien hyllar en fallen Air and Marine-agent.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Studenterna narmar sig mittpunkten av sin utbildning, och de ikoniska luftstriderna borjar. Deras erfarna instruktorer har hundratals flygtimmar bakom sig. For att klara testerna måste motståndaren overlistas och ett "dodande skott" avfyras. En student kanner pressen av att flyga med sin kommendorkapten, medan en annan måste tygla sina aggressiva instrinkter.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thords fardigheter satts på prov nar den knepiga raddningen av en gravmaskin tvingar honom att hitta nya losningar. Men han får dubbla problem nar nyborjaren Terjes vårdslosa korning slutar i katastrof. I norr forsoker Jo Roger och Ole Henrik radda en lastbil som har fastnat i ett dike, 20 meter från vagkanten. De har med sig två stora bargningsbilar men behover hitta mer kraft.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar en laxtransport kraschar i diket blir det startskottet for en natt av kaos for Thord. Medan Thord och Bjorn forsoker radda lastbilen och dess vardefulla last, måste Thord skicka Domenic på ett solouppdrag for att kontrollera en kaotisk situation på en okand olycksplats. Med Thords kapacitet pressad till det yttersta måste Terje och Ørjan radda en buss som kraschat ner i ett dike.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar lastbilar kor forbi i hog fart for att ta sig upp for en backe satter Thord sitt liv på spel for att radda en lastbil som sladdat till stillastående på isen och undvika att fyrtiotonnaren glider tillbaka in i motande trafik. I norr kampar Raido mot isiga forhållanden for att barga en fiskbil. Men vagen ar så forradisk att det ar svårt att ens stå upp, vilket gor att raddningen verkar omojlig.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Under en natt med kaos, krascher och konvojer blir Thord upprord nar ett annat foretag tar sig in på hans territorium. I norr tar Ole Henrik med sig foretagets nya bargningsbil på dess forsta uppdrag att radda en lastbil som kraschat djupt ner i ett snotackt dike och sedan slagit runt 90 grader. Ole Henrik ar ivrig att testa den nya bargningsbilen for att se om den ar vard den stora investeringen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Mitt i natten blir Thord och Erlend skramda nar de forsoker radda en skåpbil som kraschat intill en kyrkogård. Nar de drar skåpbilen uppfor en istackt, brant backe fruktar de att deras nasta destination kommer att vara kyrkogården. Även i soder ger Bjorn nyborjaren Jan Erik en gammaldags lektion i hur man blir en riktig raddningsarbetare.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar en lastbilschauffor blir stående på isen, men vagrar ta emot hjalp från Thord, skapar han kaos på vagen. I norr holl ett sandningsfordon på att sakra vagen nar det också råkade ut for isen. Jo Rogers ar hårt pressad att dra upp sandaren ur diket och få den tillbaka på vagarna, men riskerar att krossa chassit mot vagkanten.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord forsoker bogsera bort en bil som kraschat 60 meter ner på ett falt efter en snostorm, men blir stressad nar ett vinschfel hotar raddningen. I norr undviker en lastbilschauffor en frontalkrock genom att styra lastbilen och slapet av vagen och ner i hårdpackad sno. Raido tar over raddningsarbetet, men vad han an gor ar det aldrig tillrackligt.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar Thord och Bjorn raddar en lastbil som hotar att tippa kryper Thord under slapet under dragningen och lagger sitt liv i Bjorns hander. I norr glider en snoplog av vagen på blankis. Jo Roger beger sig ut for att radda den, men får dubbla problem nar en andra lastbil kraschar på samma stalle och landar rakt ovanpå snoplogen.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi ger oss ut på ett aventyr for att upptacka de mest episka ingenjorsbedrifterna i Europas nordligaste region. Från Islands maktiga lavabarriarer och Finlands rekordhoga vertikala fabrik till varldens storsta trastad i Stockholm och en svensk farja som flyger over vattnet – detta ar Nordeuropas mest fantastiska underverk.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: April 1940: Tyska slagskepp infiltrerar norska fjordar i ett forsok att erovra viktiga hamnar och sakra Hitlers tillgång till jarnmalm. Men brittiska Royal Navy ar dem i halarna, vilket utloser en kamp om kontrollen over det neutrala Norge. Denna strid kraver banbrytande metoder for krigforing och mobiliserar motståndskampar medan hemliga kommandosoldater tavlar for att hindra nazisterna från att bygga den forsta atombomben.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På Hardangervidda slår sig Thord och Bjoern samman for att radda en lastbil och slapvagn som kraschat i diket. De två cheferna ar oense om hur raddningsaktionen ska gå till – men på berget finns det bara plats for en chef. I norr ar Ole Henrik nu delagare i sin fars firma. Nar en lastbil med en vardefull last blommor behover raddas ar pressen på honom storre an någonsin.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Nar Alaska Airlines Flight 261 plotsligt kraschar ner I Stilla havet finner utredarna ett kritiskt underhållsproblem med dodliga konsekvenser.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På Hardangervidda slår sig Thord och Bjoern samman for att radda en lastbil och slapvagn som kraschat i diket.
